helmet.name: Charon
helmet.description:
DEF +10%

After action, 50% chance to "Increase all incoming damage by 15%" for 1 enemy within 3 grids. Lasts 1 turn

helmet.name: Dark Crown
helmet.description:
MDEF +10%

HP +5%

helmet.name: Odin's Battle Helm
helmet.description:
MDEF +10%

After killing an enemy, dispels 5 buffs from 1 enemy within 3 grids.

helmet.name: Soul Stealer Headdress
helmet.description:
MDEF +10%

After taking action, 50% chance to silence active skills of one enemy within 3 grids.

helmet.name: Witch's Reminiscence
helmet.description:
HP +10%

After taking action, an adjacent ally is granted skill increased by 20%, immunity to heal reversal (conversion from healing to damage) and unable to act again effects. Lasts 1 turn.

helmet.name: Tennyo's Headdress
helmet.description:
HP +10%

After action, 100% chance to apply a random buff to an ally within 2 grids.

helmet.name: Tiara
helmet.description: When unit's HP is at 100%, Def and Mdef is increased by 15%

helmet.name: Yggdrasil Wreath
helmet.description:
HP +10%

After action, give one adjacent ally "Mdef +20%, immune to stun, movement reduction, and buff negation." Lasts 1 turn

helmet.name: Frostfire Crown
helmet.description:
MDEF +10%

When attacking and entering battle, damage taken -10%.

helmet.name: Mortal Light
helmet.description:
HP +10%

Before being attacked in battle, if this unit is a [Mixed Troop], then heal 10% HP. Prevent death from fixed damage once (can occur once per battle).

helmet.name: Assault Headgear
helmet.description:
HP +5%

When attacking, Def and Mdef is increased by 10%

helmet.name: Jormungandr's Eye
helmet.description:
HP/DEF +5%

After action, 50% chance to reduce an enemy's damage by 15% within 2 grids. Lasts 1 turn

helmet.name: King's Crown
helmet.description:
HP/MDEF +5%

After action, grant 1 adjacent ally +20% increase damage. Lasts 1 turn

helmet.name: Loki's Mask
helmet.description:
HP +5%

When under melee attack Def +15%

helmet.name: Njord's Feathered Crown
helmet.description:
HP +10%

When battling against units with less HP, Def & Mdef +15%.

helmet.name: Flower Boon Bonnet
helmet.description:
HP +10%

At the end of your turn, if the unit's life is less than 50%, restore 20% maximum HP.

helmet.name: Twilight Helmet
helmet.description: DEF/MDEF +8%

helmet.name: Doomsday Herald
helmet.description:
MDEF +10%

After taking action, 50% chance to inflict "Cannot be healed" on an enemy within 2 blocks. Lasts 1 turn.

helmet.name: Aeneas's Helmet
helmet.description:
HP +10%

DEF +5%

helmet.name: Carbon Fiber Helmet
helmet.description:
When Units HP is greater than 50%, DEF/MDEF +8%

When Unit's HP is less than 50%, ATK/SKILL +8%

helmet.name: Chief's Helmet
helmet.description:
HP +10%

After taking action, grant 1 adjacent ally +20% DEF and prevent debuffs that prevents them from being healed. Lasts 1 turn

helmet.name: Gaea's Helmet
helmet.description:
When Attacked, MDEF+15%

When HP is over 80%, reduce incoming physical damage by 10%

helmet.name: Reaper Breath
helmet.description:
HP +10%

When eliminating an enemy on this turn, after taking action, deals fixed damage once to all enemies within 2 blocks at the end of your next turn. Damage is 20% of Max HP

helmet.name: Fury of Tyr
helmet.description:
DEF +10%

At the end of the turn, if unit did not perform an attack, gain "+10% Skill Damage," and "+10% Counter Damage" for 1 turn.

helmet.name: Vampire Mask
helmet.description:
DEF +10%

After action, 50% chance to reduce an enemy's Def by 20% within 2 grids. Lasts 1 turn
